name: Soop?
description:
Soop is one of your dearest friends... only he suddenly asked for your only day off in a while. 
You're afraid it's a serious issue... Is it?

Hi! This was made for Paint Jam 2021 and everything in this jam was made during the jam. This includes the music (I made the music), Art, code... Yeah that was me. 
There's 4 endings to the game (not including you just quitting) so have fun! Maybe you'll learn something too.
